description:
Course Updated On :20th Feb 2016

SAP BW is very Niche Skills and market has lot of demand for BW consultant as this skill provides best business solutions, eventually giving higher Turnovers & Profits but due to scarcity of such skilled manpower companies are bound to pay High Wages provided you must have sound knowledge about it.

So if you're a fresher or your already working with SAP looking to make your career in SAP BW then this is the perfect course for you.

Why Learn SAP BW? As of 2015, the average SAP BI/BW starting salary is over $150,000! SAP BI/BW is a recession proof career as it is not related to IT. Big Data, Reporting. Analytics. Ride the wave with SAP BI/BW. Recommended For Anyone with an interest in SAP BI/BW Anyone interested in learning about data warehousing Anyone that has some knowledge of SAP and wants to get into the BI/BW space Upon Completion You will be able to successfully perform modeling of any given DataFlow in BW Conceptually understand the inner workings of the SAP BW data warehouse Be proficient in back end SAP BW Development Be able to architect and model solutions

After going through my course you'll get a good knowledge of BW

The course have loads of document on the relevant topics which will not find online.

Topics Covered In The Course:

Modeling:

InfoObjects

  • Characteristic
  • Key Figure
  • Time
  • Unit
  • Technical

InfoCube

  1. Physical Data Store
    • Real Time
    • Standard

2. Without Physical Data Store And Its Types

Data Store Object

  • Standard
  • Write Optimized
  • Direct update

Transformation

  • Direct Assign
  • Constant
  • Routine
  • No Transformation etc.

Routines

  • Start Routine
  • End Routine

Data Transfer Process(DTP)

  • Standard
  • Direct Access
  • Error
  • RDA

InfoPackage

Virtual Provider and Open Hub Destination

A key feature of this course is you can contact the instructor at any and every step of learning this course

The best part about the course topics will be updated as per students requirement provided it should fall in the realms of Modeling

After you have completed this course you will know each and every steps to complete the Modeling in BW and precautions to be taken so as to get a stable system

*****If you are looking to get a BW Remote Access then just drop us a mail at Cogent.Tutorials@gmail.com we would try to help you out or in getting discounts as well.****
title: SAP BW Data Modeling For Beginners Training 2016 - SAP BW
